short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use hammers to hit the seesaw and link all circles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the hammers to launch the ball and connect circles. Position of the ball on the seesaw and which hammer you use will decide the direction of the ball. 
We created this game to improve your mood while you are having mega fun. Enjoy :)
